sentence.Network_en: Any child who is caught will be kept in at playtime.
sentence.Network_cn: 凡是被抓住的孩子在课间游戏时要被留在屋里。

sentence.Network_en: With so much homework to do, her playtime is now very limited.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为作业太多，她现在的娱乐时间很少。

sentence.Network_en: We go to playtime and we all have to hold hands when we walk there.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们一起玩,出去散步的时候,我们手拉着手.

entry.tran: （学校里低龄孩子的）课间游戏时间
entry.def: In a school for young children, playtime is the period of time between lessons when they can play outside.

example.ex: Any child who is caught will be kept in at playtime.
example.tran: 凡是被抓住的孩子在课间游戏时要被留在屋里。
